title: Altitude
text: The altitude of a triangle is a line segment that connects a vertex to the opposite side of the triangle.

hintAnswer: The altitude creates a right angle with the opposite side.
title: Relationship of Altitude
text: Think about how the altitude is related to the angle between the vertex and the opposite side. What role does the angle play?
choices: The altitude forms an acute angle with the opposite side
The altitude creates a right angle with the opposite side.
